Body.Content:
Starting June 27, 2025, users will be able to search and navigate within their agents using Microsoft Copilot Studio.

How does this affect me?
This feature makes it easy for you to instantly search and navigate to elements across your entire agent, without switching tabs or manually scanning through content. You can search across knowledge, topics, tools, skills, and entities defined in your agent, all from one place.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Microsoft Copilot Studio - Search and navigate within your agent
